channel.title: Nuxt on Jamstack Themes
channel.description: Recent content in Nuxt on Jamstack Themes

item.title: MaterialPro Free NuxtJs Admin Template
item.description: Xtreme NextJs Free Dashboard The free version comes with elegant grid design that helps you play around with the look and feel of the web app the way you want.

item.title: NuxtJs Tailwind Blog Starter
item.description: NuxtJS and tailwind Blog Starter This starter is very light-weight to showcase portfolio & write blog.

item.title: Commerce.js Vue.js Boilerplate
item.description: Commerce.js boilerplate built with Vue.js, for fast eCommerce development and design.

item.title: Awake Nuxt Blog
item.description: Awake is a Nuxt.js template for generating a beautifully robust static site with blog.

item.title: Nuxt Netlify CMS Boilerplate
item.description: A super unopinionated starter project, built off the create-nuxt-app CLI tool, and leveraging Netlify CMS to generate content in the Nuxt API from flat files.

item.title: Nuxt Tailwind Netlify CMS Starter
item.description: Start with Typescript, TailwindCSS, Nuxt, Netlify Forms & Netlify CMS, includes pagination, seo & pwa ready.

item.title: Bael Theme
item.description: Bael is a free blogging theme to use with Netlify CMS.
